price: 43 Nul peuple n’est en mesure d’avancer ou de reculer le terme qui lui est assigné[897].
arabic: مَا تَسۡبِقُ مِنۡ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسۡتَـٔۡخِرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: mā tasbiqu min ummatin ajalahā wamā yastakhirūna
